snippet: LOWENSTEIN--Harry, 96, died at home in New York. A successful businessman, at 17 he was smuggled into Palestine to fight for the establishment of Israel, served with the Jewish Brigade in WWII, then arrived penniless in the US. When retired he became regional and New York director of SCORE. Devoted father and granddad, he joined his loving wife Ruth on Valentine's Day. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LOWENSTEIN--Harry, 96, died at home in New York. A successful businessman, at 17 he was smuggled into Palestine to fight for the establishment of Israel, served with the Jewish Brigade in WWII, then arrived penniless in the US. When retired he became regional and New York director of SCORE. Devoted father and granddad, he joined his loving wife Ruth on Valentine's Day. 1/3
